website_summaries.verdict: These trendy Michael Kors sunglasses come in three different colorations to suit your style. Made of smooth acetate and feature unique, stud detailing, you're sure to look your best in these new sunnies.
pros: Terrific price point compared to other models

customer_reviews.title: Love my new sunglass 🕶
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and great sunglass😎 . It really matches my face and eyebrows😉
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I may be old, but I feel like a rock star in my MK glasses! Not only comfortable, but the clarity just blows my mind!
customer_reviews.author: Carmel Carol

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sunglasses. The size and style are perfect for my face. I might buy it again for my sister.
customer_reviews.author: K. N. LE

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, Great Quality Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these shades! I was looking for a stylish alternative to the expensive shades my optometrist sells. I usually do cat eyes, but wanting something bigger and modern. These complement my face and fit perfectly. I hope to add a prescription to them. The case, which comes with wipes, is pretty and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: So Happy I Bought These!
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are perfect. I love the size and the comfort, and they are very stylish and classy looking. They came in a nice Michael Kors case that snaps closed. They look GREAT on and have a quality feel that you would expect from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: Shades
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these sunglasses. I bought a pair a few yrs ago that got scratched & was excited to find another pair for an excellent price here on amazon!!!! Super comfortable & the lenses are so crisp& clear!!
customer_reviews.author: EShenefield

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love them sexy and dark keeps sun out . Cute case and great price they were perfect I love them so much fixing to order another pair in black to match my other bags. So great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! I have a small face so I was worried that they might be to big for my face but I was wrong. In fact I wear small prescription glasses and they fit over those just fine without rubbing. I'm telling you I don't like big fly looking glasses and these are not. These are so stylish yet understated. But then what do you expect from Michael Kors!!!! Style!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Great style, Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love them . They fit my face perfectly. Not too big, not too small and they don't have the reflective lens, which I did not want but saw a lot of glasses advertised with them. So make sure to read the description throughly.
customer_reviews.author: Margo Simonian

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware, Crappy Quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are made of a crappy quality ! These are already bent, and my last sunglasses that I purchased in Hawaii on vacation I wore for about 5 years with no problems, no bending, I unfortunately lost them. Total waste of money,!
customer_reviews.author: Susan D Smith

customer_reviews.title: Mangled Case!
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are great as expected. The case however, came damaged. I purchased them new and not used or like new...... Case should arrive in good condition not mangled. Hard to give as a gift with a messed up case and no time now to exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So great I bought 2!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sunglasses I’ve ever owned. I love MK products, but these particular sunglasses fit great and look great. I’ve purchased 2 pair because I love the way they feel.
customer_reviews.author: A. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses.
customer_reviews.text: I love my glasses! They are so stylish. They fit great. They go with anything. Perfect with any wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleMyBell

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MICHAEL KORS SUNGLES
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE MICHAEL KORS SUN GLASSES . THEY FIT ME JUST RIGHT
customer_reviews.author: gail boykins

customer_reviews.title: Great gift from my husband!! - Review completed by the wife.
customer_reviews.text: Husband got these for me as a christmas gift they are very well made and great at keeping the sun out...loving them for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Rigoberto Morales Jr

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous glasses. These were for a gift but i ...
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous glasses. These were for a gift but i think i might want one for myself. Thank you for the fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Potatos Mommy

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY, GOOD PACKAGING AND GOOD SHIPPING
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my best friend. She loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Nena

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: They look great. Got them on time and are using them.
customer_reviews.author: Matt A.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses 🕶 are great. Very comfortable and can wear all day with no issue. Glad they came with a hard case and cleaning cloth.
customer_reviews.author: M. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Love these! I sadly lost my sunglasses last weekend ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I sadly lost my sunglasses last weekend so I found these and they were delivered 2 quick days later. I usually need to try on sunglasses before purchasing but these looked super cute and fit great! Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the style
customer_reviews.text: Glasses were great! I love the look and quality. They came with a nice case.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTEN POWELL

customer_reviews.title: Case should match glass color/style
customer_reviews.text: Love the glasses, but very disappointed with the carrying case. It was white. I ordered the glasses to go with my handbag and was hoping for the same color scheme all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great just what I was looking for. Great for rx
customer_reviews.author: Cornell Mattox

customer_reviews.title: ... what I wanted and my new sunglasses are a perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I got exactly what I wanted and my new sunglasses are a perfect fit! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Super cool
customer_reviews.text: This is such a perfect fit for my face and too damn gorgeous one. I loved this glares from MK
customer_reviews.author: Pratibha

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so in love with this sunglasses, they also had original MK book care for glasses .and awesome case as well .
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: The glasses were smaller than I thought they'd be. The plastic frame felt like any other $10.00 pair of glasses I've bought.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Mish

customer_reviews.title: Weird smell!!!
customer_reviews.text: The glasses itself is OK, however, in its case, there is a weird unpleasant smell. I bought it as a gift but might return it.
customer_reviews.author: Saeed Zal

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty good I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s really good item I like it and it fits perfect and the price is awesome. Thank you amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: They're super cute! But shipping was super slow. They are the perfect shape. Not too big or little.
customer_reviews.author: Yaritza Morales

customer_reviews.title: good quality and pretty glasses
customer_reviews.text: she loved it, soo fancy and good quality and such a great it looks
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Castro

customer_reviews.title: Loving these MK glasses
customer_reviews.text: Just lovely. Received these sunglasses very quickly, decent price too.
customer_reviews.author: V Manila

customer_reviews.title: To big for my face
customer_reviews.text: Nice, well made sunglasses, but they were just to big for my face
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Pettipas

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Fit’s like if they were made for my face. I’m in love it them.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy.

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the product.
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfect, they look good, and they have a storage hard cover that protects them.
customer_reviews.author: VFERN

customer_reviews.title: My product come on time
customer_reviews.text: I like Michael kors, I love all of the products
customer_reviews.author: Sonia holt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice glasses! I loved it! Fits pretty good... Original product.
customer_reviews.author: Bruna

customer_reviews.title: Very good pair of sunglasses at amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: I got an excellent pair of suns from this seller at amazing price. Love them! They are so cool and fit my face perfect. The shipping was very quick also! 6 stars!
customer_reviews.author: alex

product_meta.title: Michael Kors Women's Jan MK2045 55mm
product_meta.description: The right pair of shades can totally turn your day around! Give these trendy Michael Kors Sunglasses a try. Made of smooth acetate. Brand logo at temples. Provides 100% UV protection. Chic stud detailing. Imported. WARNING California's Proposition 65 Measurements: Eye Size: 54 mm Bridge: 16 mm Temple Size: 145 mm Weight: 1 oz
feature_bullets: The right pair of shades can totally turn your day around! Give these trendy Michael Kors Sunglasses a try.
Chic stud detailing. Imported. WARNING California's Proposition 65 Measurements: Eye Size: 54 mm Bridge: 16 mm Temple Size: 145 mm Weight: 1 oz
